form.description: This dashboard provides an overview of triggered tactics and techniques based on enabled correlation rules with related MITRE ATT&CK annotations.

search.query: | makeresults | eval mitre_use_es=`mitre_use_es` | eval results=if(mitre_use_es=="1",1,null()) | table results

| inputlookup mitre_all_rule_technique_lookup | fields rule_name, technique_id | join rule_name [ search `mitre_rules` | fields rule_name, urgency | lookup urgency_score_lookup urgency | stats max(score) as max_score, count by rule_name] | stats sum(count) as triggered_count list(rule_name) as rule_name_list, max(max_score) as max_score by technique_id delim=";" | nomv rule_name_list

| inputlookup $tok_display_option$ | foreach TA00* [| lookup mitre_tt_lookup technique_id as <<FIELD>> OUTPUT technique_name as <<FIELD>>_technique_name | eval <<FIELD>>_technique_name=mvindex(<<FIELD>>_technique_name,0)]
